name: Yuwee (Browser Version)
description:
Browser Playable version 3

Play the game battle with 100,000 LP!

Enjoy a very unique strategy on this BlackJack Duel.

Use 7 different skills each round!

Fight an intelligent AI!

Elemental Reactions and Sidebets!

Cute Card Design and voice overs!

Leave a comment if you have any suggestions or bug reports!
